verbose_text: More importantly, p21 Waf1 / Cip1 protein increased minimally by 4 h post release (1.2-fold) and significantly (3-fold) at 8 h post release in panobinostat treated cells whereas no increase in p21 Waf1 / Cip1 protein was observed in control treated cells (XREF_FIG).
evidence: increased minimally by 4 h post release (1.2-fold) and significantly (3-fold) at 8 h post release in panobinostat
